snippet.title: We Harvest Shadows - Exclusive Extended Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2024
snippet.description: Watch this exclusive We Harvest Shadows extended reveal trailer for a look at the unsettling world, gameplay, and a peek at the nightmare that awaits you in this upcoming first-person farming horror allegory game. We Harvest Shadows will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam. You can learn more about We Harvest Shadows on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1559720/
